thread.title: Nancy Pelosi Mistakenly Claims Obamacare Drafting Process Was “Transparent”
thread.title_full: Nancy Pelosi Mistakenly Claims Obamacare Drafting Process Was “Transparent”

author: V Saxena
title: Nancy Pelosi Mistakenly Claims Obamacare Drafting Process Was “Transparent”
text:
DEVELOPING: Trump Considers Sending B-52 Nuclear Bombers to Korean Peninsula 
While the Democrats’ sleazy behavior should be condemned, it ought also to serve as a lesson to Republicans — particularly those who reportedly tried to hide their repeal/replace bill in a basement — that attempting to draft bills while hiding in shadowy corners is never the answer. 
For Republicans to piece together a satisfactory — if not great — replacement, they need to ensure that the process remains visible to the public, so that we the American people can offer our input and ensure that we get what we want. 
As for Pelosi, it is unlikely that this 76-year-old dog (if you’ll forgive the use of an old expression) is capable of learning any new tricks, so perhaps she should just run along home. 
Please share this story on Facebook and Twitter and let us know what you think about Nancy Pelosi peddling revisionist history about Obamacare. What do you think about Nancy Pelosi's tweet? Scroll down to comment below! Advertisement Popular Right Now
